channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kpods pushed by organised crime groups: UN; Jannik Sinner is first Italian to win Wimbledon singles: Singapore live news

South Korea set to order airlines to check Boeing jet fuel switches

item.title: A military exercise drawing together 19 nations and 35,000 forces begins in Australia
item.description: The largest-ever war fighting drills in Australia, Exercise Talisman Sabre, is underway and expected to attract the attention of Chinese spy ships

item.title: California farmworker who fell from greenhouse roof during chaotic ICE raid dies
item.description: A farmworker who fell from a greenhouse roof during a chaotic ICE raid this week at a California cannabis facility has died
